questions_answers.question: What did the little mouse do to the lion?
questions_answers.answer: The little mouse ran up the lion's neck and slid down his back.

questions_answers.question: How did the lion react when the mouse asked what he can do?
What did the mouse do when he heard a big roar?
What did the mouse see when he saw the king of the jungle?
questions_answers.answer: The mouse saw the king of the jungle tied to a tree.
